channel.title: New to Kubuntu, and need some help
channel.description: Well I newly installed Kubuntu, and I love it except, I cant figure out how to Install things, as in Flash Player, Java etc. So if anyone want to help out, you're welcome to help me.

item.title: New to Kubuntu, and need some help
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Visit this URL in Konqueror and read through what you want, it gives you step by step instructions for everything:

help:/kubuntu/sysdocs-index/index.html

Read full topic
item.source: New to Kubuntu, and need some help

item.title: New to Kubuntu, and need some help
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

Flash player, just go to a site that requires it such as youtube.com and view a video, click get it and install it ? Close your browser and restart it ?

Java ;

Go to your package manager, find sun java, install it via that ?

Read full topic
